automatisme.title: Automation
automatisme.subtitle: Control Command Cabinets
automatisme.description: Personal clave: Un equipo más reducido que garantiza una mayor flexibilidad y una eficiencia máxima.

page.mainTitle: Custom solutions for operating your installations

intro.p1: Our control command cabinets are custom designed and manufactured to meet the specific requirements of each hydroelectric project. Each cabinet is the result of dedicated engineering integrating the latest automation technologies.
intro.p2: We provide complete design from electrical studies to manufacturing in our workshops, including PLC programming and graphical interfaces.
intro.p3: All cabinets systematically undergo verification and workshop testing according to a determined protocol before shipment.
intro.p4: Our programs are developed to take into account the specifics of the hydroelectric industry, enabling optimization of energy production.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
items: High quality equipment and widely available products ensuring spare parts availability

features.title: Main Features
items: Normal, fast shutdown and emergency sequence management in case of faults
Automatic starts and stops based on water levels and/or spot energy prices
Different operating modes: Level, Power, or pressure regulation (taking pressure losses into account)
Opening, power, and head limitations for low-head plants
Maintenance mode allowing individual control of components and motors for safe testing
Water intake safety and security control

modernization.title: Modernization Projects
modernization.intro1: Plant modernization is generally carried out for two essential reasons: equipment obsolescence or increased efficiency to improve the load factor (downtime reduction, feature addition, process automation).
modernization.intro2: In general, the renovation of control equipment results in:

steps.title: Modernization is carried out in three stages

step1.title: Diagnosis of existing equipment
step1.description: Complete analysis of current system condition

step2.title: Analysis of different solutions
step2.description: Collaborative study with the client of available options

step3.title: Modernization
step3.description: Partial or complete equipment upgrade following the selected solution

newProjects.title: New Projects
newProjects.p1: The control command system and more generally all electrical equipment are often little considered when carrying out a project. Production equipment (turbines and generators) capture all the attention for various reasons (higher costs, yields, etc.).
newProjects.p2: These systems are however an essential factor in the reliability and productivity of an installation and have a direct impact on the profitability of a project.
newProjects.p3: Optimal integration of the control command system with production equipment ensures ease of daily operation of the installation as well as simplified maintenance, thus contributing to reducing operating costs.

cta.title: A control command cabinet project?
cta.subtitle: Our engineering team is ready to study your project

scada.title: SCADA / Supervision
scada.subtitle: Intelligent and Secure Supervision
scada.description: Development of ergonomic and user-friendly SCADA systems with a sleek aesthetic and comprehensive features for simple and efficient operation

page.subtitle: Intelligent and Secure Supervision
intro: Our SCADA (Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition) systems offer complete and intuitive supervision of your hydroelectric installations to operate both production units and water intakes and dams. Developed with particular attention to ergonomics, they enable optimal operation of your installations.
Each SCADA is custom developed with a modern graphical interface and real-time animated synoptics. The refined aesthetics facilitate handling and reduce operators' cognitive load.
Our SCADA systems integrate advanced functions: alarm management, historization, preventive maintenance support tools, remote access, etc.

The development of our systems relies on market software solutions (standard software, proven solutions) and a multi-vendor approach. This choice guarantees an open and independent architecture, essential for the sustainability of your platform.
We implement hypervision that unifies and secures all your sites. Connected via VPN, they are controlled from a single interface.

centralizedSupervision.title: Centralized Supervision
items: Installation overview with animated synoptics, alarm dashboard and curve tools through an ergonomic and intuitive interface
Hypervision to control all your sites from a single interface

remoteAccess.title: Remote Access
items: Secure remote access to your sites from computer or smartphone
Alarm message transmission via SMS / email or WhatsApp

maintenanceTools.title: Maintenance Support Tools
items: Maintenance mode allowing individual control of components and motors for safe testing
All sensor settings and calibration accessible from supervision

vitesse.title: Speed Regulation
vitesse.subtitle: Controllers for Kaplan, Francis and Pelton turbines
vitesse.description: Speed ​​controller for Kaplan, Francis, and Pelton turbines. Suitable for new projects and upgrading older mechanical or electronic controllers. Custom-designed hydraulic units.

page.subtitle: Regulators for Kaplan, Francis and Pelton turbines

intro.title: Speed control
intro.p1: Our speed regulator offers a universal regulation solution, designed to adapt to all types of hydraulic turbines: Kaplan, Francis and Pelton. Its versatility makes it the ideal choice for both new installations and the modernization of existing systems, whether mechanical or electronic.
intro.p2: High-performance and flexible, it provides primary regulation for isolated grid sites and can also handle secondary regulation for interconnected installations.
intro.p3: Based on PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) technology, our regulator guarantees ease of maintenance and long-term spare parts availability. Its design strictly complies with international standards IEC-61362, IEC-60308, IEEE 125-2007 and IEEE 1207-2011.

groupesHydrauliques.title: Hydraulic power units
groupesHydrauliques.intro: For a turnkey solution, we expand our expertise in collaboration with our partner: we design and manufacture, partially or completely, the hydraulic servo units that control your turbine.
items: Custom design according to your needs

piecesReserve.title: Spare Parts
piecesReserve.intro: We also offer a spare parts kit consisting of a backup unit to avoid failures.
items: Server providing primary and secondary regulator (computer interface)

fonctionnalites.title: Features
items: Synchronization (unit speed equalization with grid speed)
Isolated grid operation (primary regulation) in isochronous mode or with droop
Interconnected grid operation (secondary regulation) with frequency compensation
Load control with 4 operating modes: Opening, Power, Level, Flow
Multiple configurable load take-up ramps for each regulation mode
Two parameter sets for each mode (no-load, loaded, isolated grid)
Blade / opening coordination control for Kaplan turbines
Injector / deflector coordination control for Pelton turbines
Opening order and injector opening balance control for Pelton turbines
Opening limiter at startup, no-load and load

sequences.title: Sequences and tests
items: Solo start without load (wicket gate balancing and slow components opening if needed)
Emergency stop by rapid gate closure

caracteristiques.title: Technical Specifications
items: Compatibility with Kaplan, Francis, Pelton turbines
Compliant with IEC 61362 and IEEE 125 standards

protections.title: Electrical Protection
protections.subtitle: Engineering and Commissioning Expertise for Electrical Protection Systems
protections.description: Complete protection solutions for alternators, transformers, and power lines. Advanced protection systems compliant with international standards.

page.mainTitle: Engineering and Commissioning Expertise for Electrical Protection Systems

equipementsCritiques.title: Our expertise covers all critical equipment:

etudesIngenierie.title: 1. Engineering Studies and Protection Coordination
etudesIngenierie.intro: We perform in-depth calculation studies to ensure perfect selectivity of your protections:

items.description: according to IEC 60909 standard
using ETAP reference software
(calculation notes, study reports, tripping curves)

configurationTests.title: 2. Configuration, Testing and Commissioning
configurationTests.intro: Our intervention ensures compliance between theoretical study and field reality:

items.description: of relay parameters
on test bench to pre-validate functionalities
with secondary injection case for final protection chain verification
Complete protection: differential, thermal overload, imbalance, loss of excitation, reverse power
Differential protection, tank ground, Buchholz, thermal overload, earth protection
Distance protection, directional overcurrent, ground fault, automatic recloser

cta.title: Protect your electrical equipment
cta.subtitle: Ensure the safety and reliability of your installation

instrumentation.title: Instrumentation
instrumentation.subtitle: Supply, installation and commissioning
instrumentation.description: We can provide you with a solution for instrumentation and spare parts for all your needs, both in the factory and at dams and water intakes.

intro.title: Complete Instrumentation Solution
intro.p1: Whether for your production units, dams or water intakes, we offer instrumentation and spare parts for all your equipment. Our expertise covers all your needs.
intro.p2: Our range includes measuring instruments for: levels (dams, water intakes, channels), temperatures (bearings, windings, oil), positions (valves, flaps, distributor), speeds (turbine rotation), vibrations (unit monitoring), flow rates (open channel and penstock).
intro.p3: All our sensors are industrial grade, selected from recognized manufacturers. They are calibrated in the laboratory before delivery and supplied with their calibration certificates.
intro.p4: Installation is carried out by our teams or our qualified local partners. We provide complete wiring to control cabinets, commissioning tests and operator training.

cta.title: Need instrumentation?
cta.subtitle: We support you in choosing and installing your sensors

ingenierie.title: Electrical System Engineering
ingenierie.subtitle: HV Substations, Auxiliary Distributions, Auxiliary Systems
ingenierie.description: Electrical System Engineering: Integration of all electrical equipment necessary for the operation of a hydroelectric power plant. Post-high voltage, transformer and auxiliary distribution systems essential for the proper functioning of the plant.

page.subtitle: HV Substations, Auxiliary Distributions, Auxiliary Systems

intro.title: Complete Integration of Electrical Systems
intro.p1: We provide engineering and integration of all electrical equipment necessary for the operation of a hydroelectric plant, from high voltage substations to auxiliary distributions. We perform short-circuit and protection selectivity studies using dedicated software.
intro.p2: MV/HV substations include step-up transformers, cells and circuit breakers and all equipment necessary for evacuating the produced energy to the grid.
intro.p3: Auxiliaries – or electrical Balance of Plant (eBoP) include all auxiliary electrical equipment essential to ensure proper plant operation.

items.title: Complete Integration
items.description: Comprehensive design of all electrical systems

items.description: Short-circuit studies and protection selectivity

dataVisualisation.title: Data Visualization and Reports
dataVisualisation.subtitle: Industry 4.0 - IoT - BigData
dataVisualisation.description: Innovative Industry 4.0 solutions integrating IoT and Big Data to collect, store, compile and leverage data in the form of dynamic dashboards

page.subtitle: Industry 4.0 - IoT - BigData
intro: Our Data Visualization solutions transform your raw data into actionable information. Through the integration of IoT and BigData technologies, we collect, store and analyze all data from your installations, whether production data (power, levels, temperatures, speed, unit operating status, etc.) or alarms. It is also possible to enrich this database with information from Vigicrue or Météo France or others.

Dynamic dashboards offer a real-time view of your essential KPIs: production, availability, load factor, and much more. Each dashboard is customizable to your needs and includes features such as a logbook to record events. This facilitates data analysis, trend identification, unusual drift detection and thus helps optimize the efficiency of your installations.
Access to this platform is via a web server, ensuring compatibility with any type of device (PC, smartphone) and featuring a password-secured authentication system.

items.title: Data Collection
items.description: Automatic and time-stamped data acquisition from all your installations, vigicrue, Météo France, etc.

items.title: Analysis
items.description: Transforms historized data into consolidated and valued data

items.title: Visualization
items.description: Interactive and customizable dashboards

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
items: Storage on local server and/or cloud

cta.title: Leverage your data!
cta.subtitle: Transform your data into competitive advantage
